
# NVIDIA Notes

Vendor | Target | Architecture                   | Notes
-------|--------|--------------------------------|-------------------------
NVIDIA | `sm35` | `3.0, 3.5, 3.7, 5.0, 5.2, 6.1` | `.shaderFloat16 = false`
NVIDIA | `sm75` | `5.3, 6.0, 6.2, 7.x+`          | `.shaderFloat16 = true`
